articles.title: Roll for insight: Using Dungeons & Dragons as a group therapy tool - Ars Technica
articles.description: Research is ongoing, but therapists are happy with early results.

This year marks the 50th anniversary of the tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) Dungeons & Dragons (D&D). A game of creativity and imagination, D&D lets players weave their own narrati… [+4467 chars]

articles.author: Nic Robertson
articles.title: CNN aboard Israeli tanker for strike on Houthi-controlled port in Yemen - CNN
articles.description: Aboard an aging Boeing 707, thousands of feet above the Red Sea, I don a set of high-tech 3D goggles and stare at the small TV monitor recessed in a bank of retro dials and switches.
articles.content:
